import React from "react"; function QuoteForm({postForm, setPostForm}){ //change the value of the postForm state and the input text box function inputTextHandler(e){ setPostForm((prevState) => ({...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } function displayInfo(){ console.log(postForm); } return(
